name: Hover Racing
description:
Hover racing is a game where you race with a hover car and try to place the highest in the leaderboard by completing it fast enough. The game offers a Neon-themed car and a Neon-themed map. The game is speed-runnable so if you are into that then download the game and try to get the best score possible!

_________________________________________

Keybinds:

WASD - Movement

Shift- Boost

R - Restart

Space - Reset Rotation ( If stuck somewhere)
